HEBREW: וַיְהִ֗י כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ שָׁ֣ב שָׁא֔וּל מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ לוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר הִנֵּ֣ה דָוִ֔ד בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ (ס)
ENGLISH: And it came to pass when Sha᾽ul was returned from following the Pelishtim, that it was told him, saying, Behold, David is in the wilderness of ῾En-gedi.
